'''Unswerving''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to open the chest in the middle of the [[Yaoguang Shoal|heart-shaped rock formation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Requires two players (Co-Op) to stand in the heart for the chest to spawn.
